name: The White Path
description:
You have been kinaped by someone who wants to kill you, you arrived in a white room and you have a strange controller in your hand.
Use it to revelate the walls in the room to find the exit and save your life !!!

Use the directionnal touches (UP/DOWN/LEFT/RIGHT) and left mouse button to find the path.
Be Careful you have to save your battery to find the exit door.
